title: Items of operational construction by some authorities excluded: Construction for operational purpose
clause_text: Items of operational construction by some authorities excluded: Construction for operational purposes, including maintenance of operational structures, emergency/essential staff quarters by the following organizations, authorities or departments, whether temporary or permanent, may be exempted e from the purview of these Regulations, except those relating to floor space index and fire precautions:
